archived.description: Designates whether this PromotedLink is archived.

cachedImageUrl.description: The URL of the PromotedLink's image, cached on Outbrain's servers, i.e. "http://images.outbrain.com/imageserver/v2/s/gtE/n/plcyz/abc/iGYzT/plcyz-f8A-158x110.jpg"

campaignId.description: The ID of the campaign to which the PromotedLink belongs, i.e. "00f4b02153ee75f3c9dc4fc128ab041963"

creationTime.description: The time when the PromotedLink was created, i.e. "2013-01-14T07:19:16Z"

documentLanguage.description: The 2-letter code for the language of this PromotedLink (via the PromotedLinks URL), i.e. "EN"

enabled.description: Designates whether this PromotedLink will be served.

lastModified.description: The time when the PromotedLink was last modified, i.e. "2013-03-16T10:32:31Z"

sectionName.description: The section name of the site the PromotedLink URL points to, i.e. "Sports"

siteName.description: The name of the publisher the PromotedLink URL points to, i.e. "cnn.com"

status.description: The review status of the PromotedLink, i.e. "PENDING"

text.description: The text of the PromotedLink, i.e. "Google to take over huge NASA hangar, give execs' private planes a home"

url.description: The URL visitors will be sent to upon clicking the PromotedLink, i.e. "http://www.engadget.com/2014/02/11/nasa-google-hangar-one/"
